content.detailedDescription: I get urges to randomly look up and sometimes i see things, twice now.I've taken pictures, i submitted the first set of pictures months ago and now i submit a second set. this you can clearly see as spinning, i have 4 or 5 photos of it before it hits cloud cover and disappears, i truly feel as though i'm supposes to be taking pictures, but both times i've taken pictures i never saw anything with my physical eyes, i just took photos simultaneously at a high rate of speed.
content.summary: Randomly taken pictures

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving too work one night and looked out my driver side window and noticed two stationary red/orange lights hovering one above the other over some houses.  at first i thought it was a communications tower but then when realizing exactly what they were over i realized it was over a residential neighbourhood.  i am very familiar with the area so this caused me to roll my window down to get a better look (i have dark tint on my windows of my car).  now that i was looking at these orbs without anything ruining my view, i noticed them starting to move from there original position (west) and slowly heading south.  this is when i decided i had to pull over my car. (it is a fairly busy route so pulling over quickly was dangerous yet i still felt the need to veer on to the side of the road).  i have witnessed these orbs 3 times in my life before this event and tired of everyone calling me crazy, i needed to get a photo or video for the non-believers.  as i darted out of my car i took my cell phone and proceeded to try and video the orbs.  my phone seemed to be stalling/loading for a period of time that is not normal.  i bought the phone 4 months ago and it has always ran very smoothly.  sure enough, the camera app opens and seconds before i am able to push the capture button, the two orbs went off.  off but no away.  while looking through my phones camera i was not able to see any objects because it was already pretty dark out.  as i looked up (normal vision, not through camera) i noticed i could still see two objects in the sky just sitting there.  i stared at these objects for a least another 2 minutes hoping they may light up again.  this did not happen.  i decided that i would leave because i was on the side of the highway and these objects were not making themselves visible again.  when i got to work i noticed my watch had randomly stopped as well right at 9:02pm.  battery completely dead.
like i said this is the third time this has happened to me in my life and i have been aggressively educating myself on all unexplained occurrences.

this is more or less too see if anyone else out there happened to see what i saw.  it will make me feel alot less crazy if i had some actual evidence to back up my claims.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 bright orange lights that dimmed when i took out camera.  one above the other

content.detailedDescription:
I was working on my car at the back of my house. we live not far from manchester airport about half an hours drive and occasionally get air traffic passing over head on route to land at manchester airport. 
i heard what sounded like a large jet gaining altitude, and was curious as we normally just get them going into land at about a 1000 feet or so. so i was looking for the source of the noise, and couldn't see due to patchy cloud.
then i noticed what i thought was a high flying plane between some clouds, i discounted this straight away as it had no wings and i had a clear view,it was a silvery ball, i then noticed another object to the south of the first that looked exactly the same, they seemed to be stable and hovering. 
the first ball then seemed flash a dark section of it's exterior to the other ball, then a few seconds later it did the same thing back to the first ball. 
i then ran into the house to grab my phone to make a video, but i cannot see them on the video.
content.summary: Two silver balls hovering at the same height.

content.detailedDescription: Triangle with lights 2 at the back
content.summary: I was in my car on the highway and i saw 1 light off in the distins  and  as i got closer i saw that it wasint 1 it was 2 and it was triangal like in form with 2 lights under it like attached i obsrverd this as i got closer

content.detailedDescription:
El sabado 4 de julio mas o menos a la 1 de la madrugada estaba en mi terraza del ã¡tico tomando la fresca pues ese dia habia hecho mucha calor.
mirã© la estrellas y vi en direcciã³n oeste una luz roja a media/gran altura ( no puedo concretar los metros)
en la zona que vivo hay cerca un aeropuerto ( desde mi atico queda al este) y estoy acostumbrado a ver aviones y avionetas con sus luces intermitentes pero me extraã±ã³ pues esta unica luz roja no parpadeaba nada. podria parecer un avion que viene de frente pues poco a poco la luz se hacia un poco mã¡s grande, pero de pronto parã³ estã¡tica durante aproximandamente 20 segundos y fuã© cuando me dã­ cuenta que no era un avion y por el tipo de luz tampoco era ningãºn faro de algun helicoptero tipo de vigilancia por ejemplo. me dio tiempo de ir a buscar una camara de fotos (no camara de video) pero que si tiene la funciã³n de camara pero no de gran calidad, entonces pude grabar la luz durante unos segundos, la luz se ve pequeã±a pero en persona era mas grande. como yo veia que no grababa bien, volvã­ a mirar directamente a la luz y a los pocos segundos con una angulaciã³ aprox de 45âº se fuã© para atrã¡s pues la luz se hacia mã¡s pequeã±a (no era ningãºn foco pues al girar yo hubiera notado algo y la luz no parpadeã³ ni nada, simplemente se iva haciendo mã¡s pequeã±a como si se fuera lejos)
puedo decir que en el momento que la luz se parã³ y pensã© que no era normal, se me erizaron los pelos y pasã© un poco de alteraciã³n y un poco de miedo y estupefacciã³n.
no emitia ningãºn ruido en absoluto.
el objeto se pierde de vista gradualmente en direcciã³n noroeste.
no habia ni una sola nube puã©s ese dia el calor habia sido asfixiante.
content.summary: Vi una luz redonda y roja (no foco) avanzando y luego girar 45âº para atras

content.detailedDescription: Hhusband and i were having a fire and i noticed it out of the east it was orange and it was flickering and floating across the sky and it disappeared at the same token no sound no wind high up in the atmosphere going from east and then to the north
content.summary: Dark night... appeared out of nowhere... glowing, floating, flickering, orange, high altitude,no wind, nosound

content.detailedDescription: El domingo 16 de noviembre de 2014 a las 11:25:30 hs (hora de argentina) me encontraba próximo al lago del fuerte en la ciudad de tandil, provincia de buenos aires, república argentina. tomé varias fotos de esa zona, con la cámara de mi celular lg g2. al regresar a mi casa (en tandil) descargué la fotos a mi computadora y en ese momento pude apreciar una figura en la parte derecha de la foto a unos 35º aproximadamente al nor-este. me llamó la atención por que en ese momento no había volando ningún avión, ni pude ver personalmente al objeto en cuestión, motivo por el cual en la mayoría de las preguntas de su cuestionario puse "desconocido" o "n/a". como no puedo determinar que es lo que se aprecia en la foto les envío una copia digital para que lo analicen.
content.summary: En ningún momento vi el objeto.

content.detailedDescription:
Star-watching when an object caught my eye, moving across my field of vision in the sky. i initially assumed that i had made a mistake with the speed due to how quickly it disappeared behind a cloud, but as a regular satellite watcher, i observed a satellite approximately 3-5 minutes after witnessing the ufo and that was in my field of view for 20 seconds before disappearing. 

clearly looked like a white triangle, possibly jet sized.
content.summary: Ufo witnessed early morning in garden

content.detailedDescription: Waking from the boardwalk area towards main street in asbury park, nj i noticed a dull, bluish white light maneuvering in the sky. the object would change its course erratically in ways that no plane could. there were no faa lights. the object would pause in one place then move quickly, almost as if streaking to another place in the sky, sometimes curved and circular, sometimes a straight shot. i lost sight of the object when it seemingly disappeared.
content.summary: Dull bluish white light maneuvering in erratic way. no faa lights, no sound, seemed like it was far away, about the size of a larger star in the sky. would change course rapidly and without warning.

content.detailedDescription:
In back yard filling kiddie pool at 12:45 p.
i just happened to look straight up.
looked like jet w stream, but upon further observance, i realized it was moving way too fast, and had no sound.  the "stream" was more like a tail. following behind, but leaving no trace behind it.  ran inside to get phone, which prob took 20 secs or so, and by the time i returned, it was out of sight!!  which makes sense because it was really moving!!!
content.summary: Initially thought it was a jet bc of jet stream, but it moved way too fast, and silently.  short vid recounting event taken within minutes of sighting

content.detailedDescription:
Okay, i'm just going to clarify that i'm a total aviation geek. i know the physics of aircraft, shapes at all distances, and what they're capable of. 
a few weeks ago while i was coming home from my friend's farm after a day of shooting on his range something in the sky ahead of me caught my eye; at first i assumed it was simply a jet liner but as i looked closer i noticed some strange features not common with a jet liner. i saw something really strange flying...It was just a white stretched oval , almost cylinder shape high up the sky, higher than a jet liner i think but it had no contrail and when i stopped and turned off the truck to check it out i opened my truck's door to see if there was any sound coming from it and there was nothing. it was steadily losing altitude, i'd say it was descending at a -10o angle from 20o. after about 5 or so minutes it stopped descending and turned sharply up i'd day about 50o, maybe 60• degrees and accelerated and it was gone. i'd like to think it was something manmade or natural but i don't know. during the whole sighting i remained calm and observed...Not once did i consider panicking. i told my mom later on that day through phone when i got home and she said it could have been a drone after i told her of my experience but i've ruled that out...The way it turned would have tore a drone or aircraft in half.. i know my cloud patterns and aviation and aerodynamics as well but i've never seen anything like that. i also told a close friend of mine who 's just as in love with aviation as i am and he came to the same ruling as i did; it wasn't a bird, weather anomaly, or aircraft of terrestrial origin of any sort.
content.summary: Strange, as though they were testing maneuverability or observing something and accelerating away

content.detailedDescription:
I was in a jacuzzi in my backyard and saw a pulsating multicolored light. at first it seemed to be going from thin to orb, thin to orb, but then realized it was a disc that was spinning. i was 14 and started yelling for my dad, but he couldn't hear me. i ran inside to go get him and when i came back out it was gone. i still regret going back inside. this is an old experience and i know it's not very helpful, but it's been stuck in my craw since i was 14 years old. i don't know what it was or who it was, but i'd like to know someday because the experience changed my life. 

-andrew
content.summary: Brief observance of a pulsating multicolored disc that appeared to be spinning.

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling northbound on us 52 along the big sandy river when my wife noticed something hovering in the distance. upon asking me what it might be since we were not far from tri-state airport ion huntington wv and wondered if a plane may have been way off course. wee pulled off to the side of the road & observed the thing hovering ten moving what seemed to have been 20 miles before decelerating and disappearing behind a mountain. i did obtain quick photo with an iphone 5. although it was rather dark i stil managed to capture the basic outline and lights.
origional photo & blown up image of sighted craft. 
the map image shows my exact location (red pin) and where the craft appeared to be at the time if sighting (lavender pin)
content.summary: Traveling through wv on us route 52 when my wife observed massive triangular object hovering. we had pulled off to the side of the road to get a better look and photograph when it accelerated rapidly & traveled what seemed to be at least 10 to 20 miles

content.detailedDescription:
As a kid during apollo 11 event went outside in the evening to look at the moon if i "could see something" as only a child can fantasize.
then i saw a blue, bit pulsating lightbeam for around 30 seconds to a minute.
best to compate to the arc light an electric welding produces.
it felt as it was just for me to see.
never forgot it.
i just can remember if it was
content.summary: As a child after moonlanding went outside to look at moon saw a blue bright light beam

content.detailedDescription: I was riding in the car with my boyfriend and our friend. my boyfriend was driving. i was in the passenger seat. i was just looking out the window when what i thought was just a regular light caught my eye. it was 2:30 in the morning. we were driving through the country and the only thing to obstruct our view was the trees. from a distance it looked like the light coming off of an old barn. kind of an orange light. i saw it and tried pointing it out but the trees kept getting in the way. it had to have been miles away. we finally got a good view of it. it looked like the sun was shining through the clouds. like how the sky and the clouds look during a sunset. that orangish color. it was shaped like a cloud and gave off the same light and appearance as one. but it would have been impossible for it to have been the sun shining through a cloud at 2:30 in the morning. it was not the moon either. it was long and thick. not smooth. almost puffy like a cloud. slightly pointed at the ends where it seemed to get thinner. it was completely stationary. we saw it for a few minutes and then once we got a good view of it we slowed down and i took out my cell phone to take a picture of it. but as soon as i got my phone out it vanished. completely disappeared. we did not see it vanish. it just happened instantly. the only thing around was radio towers but those have blinking red lights that are easy to point out. i've never seen anything like this before.
content.summary: It was as if light was shining through the clouds. it was wide. orange glow. looked like an orange cloud almost. which would have been impossible at night. as soon as i was getting ready to take a picture it disappeared. as if it vanished. no trace.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of a odd cloud with the sun behind it, it was the only cloud in the sky after i took the pictures and looked at them there were strange objects in the pictures. the sun was too bright for me to look at my phone while i took the pictures that's why i see the objects afterwords.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of a odd cloud with the sun setting when looked at the pictures objects appeared in them

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of a odd cloud with the sun behind it, it was the only cloud in the sky after i took the pictures and looked at them there were strange objects in the pictures. the sun was too bright for me to look at my phone while i took the pictures that's why i see the objects afterwords.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of a odd cloud with the sun setting when looked at the pictures objects appeared in them

content.detailedDescription: I was on vacation on the island of fuerteventura, spain. one evening i took a picture of the night sky above our resort, see exif data for exposure details and camera make used. as the camera used has a very small display it was at home while reviewing the pictures on my computer monitor that i discovered the image did not just contain stars. there are several triangular objects with corners lit in different colors visible in the captured frame. as the exposure time was 30 sec the objects seem to hover motionless above the area. unfortunately this is the only image i have taken that evening. the submitted image is not altered or manipulataed in any way.
content.summary: On picture of the night sky several triangular objects with lit corners appear in different positions of the frame. see exif data for details.

content.detailedDescription: I was 9 at the time,we were having a family get together type thing at my grandmother's house in blanchard oklahoma just off of highway 76 out in the country not many houses more land than anything my grandmother's house has a long driveway from a country road leading up to the house lots of trees and some big open areas in land anyways after eating talking playing etc it was approximately 9:45pm and me and my cousin decided to go outside and walk to the pond right before turning into the driveway we let everyone know what we were doing and walk out the back door walking toward the front to go to the pond we get to the place were we parked the cars approximately 100ft from back door and we both start to feel vibration in our body's but didn't think to much of it we walk maybe 15 more feet and we completely i guess go blind we both see nothing but black we back up and we can see normal again it was dark outside but not pitch black you could still see some we look at each other say that's weird and blow it off and keep walking 5 to 10 more feet it goes pitch black once more and we hear a super fast swoosh noise of something moving at super fast speeds after hearing that we can see again and there is a huge disc shaped craft it was black with like a chromed finish and i want to say windows around it with every color you could think of coming from inside the craft moving from north ne to the right of us we were walking east it hovered approximately 15 feet away tree higth for 30 seconds then descended to an open area of trees landing, at this point we are extremely terrified we couldn't move we felt locked in place and having our thoughts scanned a door opened up poping out from top and periodically turning inside itself until it touched the ground 3 beings with big heads huge eyes it looked like what most people call greys stepped out and walked up to me the next thing i know i'm inside the craft on a table with the 3 beings looking at me there was a human looking being standing to the right side not sure if it was human or not the walls looked metallic but also looked like if you touched them u would fall threw there wasn't much in the room besides a i want to say a bath tub looking thing with black goo looking stuff in it,while i'm lying on the table the 3 "greys" stare at me getting inches from my face and i black out the next thing i know i'm looking up at the sky at it hovering tree higth like i went back in time or something and was extremely scared and me and my cousin ran frantically back to the back door running in the house this took to what we thought 1 minute to a minute and a half as we ran in our family members were worried asking us were we have been saying they was looking for us for an hour and a half i had scars on me and was bleeding down my arm and my head my cousin had bruses and was bleeding on his knee,we never told them what we encountered. ive had several incounters after this experience the last one happed one day ago 7/26/15 witch was the most moving to me i guess you could say and i need some support or help this is really making me feel out of place here on earth. i would like to tell my other encounters but i need reassurance that this isn't going to cause me to lose my life.
content.summary: Huge disc hovers and lands

content.detailedDescription: There is so much to tell, i still can't make any sense of any of it. i guess it first began with the ufo i saw, when i was staying on a property, sort of overlooking things as the land was being developed for track homes that were to be built. it was early spring in 2001, around 8:30 p.M. really not much to do, middle of no where, far from any stores or other houses, or people, really, just my ex boyfriend, myself and our kids, he was on his c.B. radio, kids were asleep, i was doing a property check, walking the property and the long driveway that lead up to the house we stayed in. after my check, i sat on the porch, it was warm, and the night was peaceful. it was then that i noticed a light coming from the end of the drive, i thought that it may have been head lights, but the lights were just something, seemed off,i watched for a while then i decided to walk down for a better look, just then it came closer and i could see that it was a circular object with lights just below the tree line and close enough to understand that it was hovering, it seemed like it, it saw me too, so i began to try to communicate with it, using very simple gestures, gestures like extending my arm and then bending it back  towards me , i did this for awhile then for some reason decided to flick a lighter, when i did this it came closer, and i would beckon it and wait and then second time i flicked my liter, it responded by making its lights brighter, and it went on like this for i dont know how long, then i guess it grew bored or tired of our game that it changed its path, and in no rush slowly went back the drive towards the street then entered the street and it was gone. want another one? okay months later maybe a year later, back living in glendora, my ex just left for work around 3:30 a.M. i got up to use the bathroom, and as i opened the door to go back to bed,at the same time, this, . . thing, creature, came out of my bedroom, the bathroom is directly across from my bed room door, we both froze locked eyes, now let me paint an mental image of this, this thing was the size of one of the small mexican ankle biters, those little dogs, chee-wa-wa , anyway, totally black, it had what looked like as i can discribe as,looked like ,ok you what our hair folicals look like, like that but big, all over if i could draw it for you you'd understand what it looked like better, but it had these red eyes, i mean led red eyes just glowing at me, we both froze, but when i moved to take a step it about faced and flew!!! in a hot second flew back into my room, i ran in right behind it, and i saw it fly into my closet, and as it went i noticed a green, lime green light glow filled the room and in it went and the green light went with it. okay, now this is the freaky part, i was a step or 2 behind it so when it trapped itself in there, i planted myself on my bed grabbed a baseball bat that was within reach and waited for it to show it self, but get this,it no longer had the same physic, as it just had a second ago, it was in my closet, i could see it was moving the clothes on the hangers, toppling over shoes boxes,i could hear it rustling thru the boxes, papers coats and whatever but i was only seeing a faint green glow bouncing in there knocking thing around,then i got a clear look, the green glow was a pin dot no bigger than the tip of my pinky! i sat there talking to it, or rather threating it and cursing at it, i was not scared, a lil freaked but over all pissed off!!! by the time this happened i was so tired of being harrassed by nightly vists of what i have nick named "space stalkers" "cosmos creepers" "dancing smurfs" or "the 3 footers" "the watchers" and of course it wouldnt be a party with out shadow people. it began as an amazement up on gmr and completely blew my mind up on mt. baldy. those beautiful silver hugh silent objects, at first events spaced apart as to just mess with my mind, but, it was a curiosity, but then the visits and events became  more frequent, and surreal. i can only do this for so long,(tell these experiences i've had) before it hurts my head and i start to feel sick, worn out. i will write again and tell of the other things that have happend, okay,one more a short one: a ball i call them probes, they're a lil bigger than a soft ball slight smaller than a soccer ball, silver, i know right? but had small round brightly colored lights on it,very bright ,they seemed to like bounced in the air as they traveled, with a slight rotation of the colors. long story short, 2 got locked in my laundry room, my ex and i argued who would be the one to open the door and let them out. we lived in a mobile home and the laundry room was just outside the dinning room window as it is atatched you can look right into the laundry room. i lost the coin toss, so i ran and swung open the door, the first one flew out "whoosh" it was gone the second one slowly cautiously, peered out the door and timidly took a short unsure bounce in the air and slowly,almost timid, bounce to he edge and the went up and gone!
content.summary: I know this will sound made up but i swear its true, i will submit to any lie detector test you can prvide

content.detailedDescription: I have a history of abductions the first when i was three years of age i had disapeared from my home aqpprox.3hrs my parents did not know of my were abouts i returned at the front door with a large flash of light my parents let me in they were in shock that i had been gone so long plus that my head had swollen to the size of a watermelon the did not bring me to hospital due to fear they would be charged with child abuse i had complete abnisia my parent had to retrain me to identify them as my parents ect.Then again i was abducted at approx.33 years of age this time i remembered a great deal of what they did to me they disected many parts of my body i well spare the graphic details i did tell my close friends that i was abducted and showed them all the 1/2 inch holes all over my body they were in shock i told them i have no pain within 48 hrs the holes were completly healed and no scareing they gave me quite a bit of imformation pertaining to who they were and where they came from they also showed me a great deal of mathimatical info ..The last time i saw a ufo was in las vegas nevada approx.12-1pm i was at a traffic light starring out to the mountain side a large saucer approx 300 to 600 feet in length it was chrome to translucent 3 to 5 seconds it vanished i was in awh amazed at excited .Its so clear in my memory i could scetch it
content.summary: I was at a stop light on the intersection of brodbent blvd.And boulder highway aprox.1pm as i stared out at mountain range i saw a disc like object chrome and translucent approx 300 to 600 feet in length within 3 to 5 seconds of observation it vanished

content.detailedDescription: I was driving n on the 710 freeway at approximately 815 pm. i noticed  2 jets coming from the west. i then called a friend in the area to come outside and look. while we were talking i followed the jet' s flight path forward and  saw a very large hat shaped object. it was glowing very brightly. while i was describing its location to my friend it completely disappeared. he then spotted a glowing object and reported that it also disappeared. we continued to monitor the sky's in separate locations. mine in burbank, his in buena park. there was a lot of plane activity. they seemed to be crisp crossing. there were also crafts with odd lights flashing, one white then 2 orange. we spotted the same craft from our different locations. he saw more follow up activity then i. i live by burbank airport. he lives by john wayne. this was not usual activity. i first felt very excited, then i became increasingly uneasy. he reported having trouble calming down to sleep.
content.summary: I

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on the back deck of the house, a friend and i were enjoying the evening. we had noted a number of planes landing at the lewiston airport that evening and after midnight we noticed what  appeared to be the lights of an aircraft to the west. the lights were very bright and blinking red and white, one atop of the other.
 
the lights were stationary, but had our attention.  the craft started towards the north and accelerated to a very surprising speed. my friend commented on how fast the craft was going (faster than a military craft) and we watch as it began to slow down.

it was at this point that the craft divided into two separate craft and began to descend.  while the craft was descending it again divided into a third object. these three separate blinking orbs then descended below the skyline, into the lewiston/clarkston area. 

we did not see anything after the point the craft descended beyond the skyline.
content.summary: Noticed flashing lights off to the west. lights accelerated to very fast speed, then slowed, split into three units and descended.

content.detailedDescription: Left front door to walk dog.Object caught my eye as i was looking forward. nothing i had ever seen before especially the unusual blue colorat first it hovered slowly in clouds then it descended and ascended numerous times silently i called the person i live with to see it and we both watched it until it descende over hill down toward ocean and as it descended out of sight a lights in the house up on the hill began to go on and off extremely fast lost sight of it behind the hill the feeling from the object was fear.
content.summary: Strange blue object hovering descending ascending landed in ocean

content.detailedDescription: We were driving to the grocery store. it was a typical summer evening. first noticed the object because there were no other clouds or planes in the sky. it was very bright like an oval flat flame and not moving. we pulled to the side of the road to observe it. there was no sound. after about 5 minutes the "flame" just went out. there appeared to be a black cylinder/cigar shaped object and out of where the flame had been another smaller black object had emerged. from the time we saw it, we had no idea what it was. a plane had even flown a distance over it at normal speed and the object clearly was not a plane as it had no wings or aviation lights. during the sighting and thereafter confusion and disbelief. still not sure what it was. we lost sight of the object because it eventually was behind some trees out of view.
content.summary: Ufo spotted hovering with orange flame/trail. began to move after a few minutes and the flame disappeared revealing a dark object

content.detailedDescription: Looking north from my porch i noticed a solid, bright, red and orange glow in the sky moving southwest. it would move slowly then stop and then shortly after begin moving again. the red glow appeared higher than the the orange and was smaller in size to the orange color. the red glow also appeared to faintly outline a triangle, though that may have been lens flare from the brightness of the red glow. i brought my family out to witness this event and they all saw it briefly. it moved itself behind a neighbors tree at which point i left my yard to position myself in a better viewing angle. it was at this point i never regained visibility of the object. i drove around town toward the north and west away from city lights and had no success in viewing the object again. about thirty minutes after the incident there was a helicopter in the sky with their searchlight pointed outward, rather than downward. that concluded everything that happened during the event. i felt the object was odd due to the color, movement, and shape, which is why i told my family to come out and look. i have always wanted to see something like this and having seen this object, which i cannot explain, left me feeling excited! i took a short video with my phone which is a samsung s3 and the quality was such garbage i don't want to use it unless it is requested. it looks like a white orb and i have only 5 seconds of it before it went behind the tree.
content.summary: Red and orange glow in the northern sky. red glow made faint triangle shape. would move and stop and move again.

content.detailedDescription: I saw 3 of thes objects floating over northwood lake in northwood nh-3 nights in a row, i woke my parents but they told me to go back to bed-i contacted them-in person, i feld so peaceful, iv never felt more at peace with myself as i did at that moment, the craft was above my house on 3rd day, as big as a football field, i will never forget it as long as i live, don't know if they took me, can't remember anything but them leaving, i swear on my child, i swear on gods name, iv stood before them..
content.summary: Human like-big eyes, made apearence to me.

content.detailedDescription:
About 5 pm on 21 july, 2015, i went to my front steps to watch a thunderstorm roll in. the storm was moving west to east, and there were two layers of cloud preceding the actual rain. clouds in both layers were turbulent and broken. lower layer was thin and covered about 50%. upper layer was heavy cumulus clouds, but not so thick as to be really dark. both layers seemed to be moving at about the same speed, meaning that the lower layer was traversing my field of view more quickly than the upper layer. a couple of minutes before the rain hit, i saw a cluster of about 8 dark spots moving in the same direction as the storm, but faster. they were at about 55 degrees up from the horizon, and in the southwest sky. my first thought was that it was a small flock of blackbirds outrunning the storm. as my attention was drawn to the cluster, i noted that the dark spots were blurry, and that there was no flapping of wings, or relative motion between the spots. they moved in unison from west to east as if they were one fixed object, always maintaining the same appearance, the same speed and same direction. they then passed behind some of the lower clouds. i got the impression that they were just at the height of the bottom of the upper clouds. this impression was probably due to their blurriness, which i surmised to have been caused by being barely within that cloud layer, and slightly obscured by thin cloud. however, when the cluster was not behind the lower cloud layer, its appearance was always the same illumination and blurriness. this leads me to believe that it was not just within the upper clouds, as that would surely have caused a variability of appearance. the cluster was traversing my field of view about 3 or 4 times faster than the lower cloud layer. that would have put them at 6 to 10 times faster than the storm speed. my guess is that they were at least 500 feet up, but no higher than 3000 ft. based on the height estimate, the cluster diameter would be 25 ft to 100 ft. there was no noise, and no apparent light emission. there did not appear to be any geometric pattern to the dark spots. when the cluster passed closest to me, directly to the south, it appeared about 65 degrees above the horizon. i lost sight of the cluster after about 25 seconds, when it was in the southeast at about 50 degrees elevation from the horizon. it became obscured behind clouds in the lower layer. based upon my estimates of 3000 ft elevation and 25 seconds, i would estimate its speed at 80 miles per hour. the grey color that was between and around the dark spots seemed to always match the sky color, supporting the premise that it was a cluster of separate objects.  however the constant appearance, speed and direction of the cluster gave it the feeling of one unified object, which might have been cloaked somehow.
i had no emotional feelings during or after the sighting. the cloudburst shortly afterward was not extremely severe, but it was a good heavy rain for about 10 minutes. what struck me as most unusual was that while conventional aircraft avoid storm clouds, this craft seemed to be within a storm system by choice. the storms that day were patchy summer smaller storms that would have been easy to avoid. also, it would have been much safer to fly at lower altitude and avoid the possible turbulence at the lower edge of the heavy cloud. the speed of the cluster was apparently sufficient to be able to avoid being within the storm system. if the object had been on the same trajectory before i spotted it, it would have been within or very near to the rain squall.
i did not get a photo, as i spent the entire time trying to characterize what i was seeing. its appearance was pretty subtle, so it might not have shown up very well in a photo anyhow.
content.summary: Cluster of blurry dark spots traveling in storm clouds just ahead of rain storm.

content.detailedDescription:
Uss dyess dd-880 was on a shakedown cruise to gitmo (guantanamo naval base) in cuba. the captain called all hands on deck and called for the special sea and anchor detail. we were headed right for a copper top and silver body ufo that we were tracking on sonar and radar. we were heading for the thing at 20 knots. most of us were either confused or scared. this thing was as big as the forrestal aircraft carrier. not in height but, in length and we could see it from 10 miles away. all of a sudden the thing started to move away from us at incredible speed and we lost the "contact".  the captain said he would log it as another "unexplained mystery" of the bermuda triangle. apparently the captain to much more about the place then we did.
      i was nineteen at the time and have been reliving that experience almost every day since we saw it. by we, i mean every man on the dyess that wasn't on duty. maybe two hundred of us. i know many of us have passed away. the captain and the xo and several of my ship mates.
     i've told people about the experience and they just "snicker". i was interested in finding out if the logs of the uss dyess were researched by you or the incident had ever been made public. 
     the evidence would be in the logs of the dyess from the spring of 1967 entries under cdr frank c. mead, usn. captain uss dyess (known as the steamin demon) a flectcher class destroyer commissioned 21 may 1945.
if there is any record of this please e-mail me or call me. the image of the " contact" has never left me and would like to know if the captain ever made an entry or if he was afraid to tarnish his great reputation with such an entry. thank you.
content.summary: Did anyone report ufo sighting by uss dyess dd-880 in the spring of 1967 in the bermuda triangle south the carolina
